item.description:
$7.50 Movie Tuesdays -Star Trek Into Darkness(2013)Note: this is NOT in 3D-Please get tickets at 6:45PM. --Movie Start time 7PM.  We still meet at 6:45PM in Lobby to go in at 6:50PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

Star Trek Into Darkness (2013) Details: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.

 

Staring: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Peter Weller and Zoe Saldana

MPAA Rating

Genres Action | Adventure | Sci-Fi

Run Time  hour  minutes

--------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $7.50!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is a pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $7.50 Movie Tuesdays - Star Trek Into Darkness (2013) Note: this is NOT in 3D
